title: Hily Dating App: Chat, Match & Date Local Singles
description:
Welcome on Hily Dating App !

With more than 13 million users worldwide, Hily is the fastest growing dating app. Hily makes it easy to meet new people, find dates, and form meaningful connections.

-  To add your Story, press Add, hold the button to record the video and let it go when your best shot is on! (Don‚Äôt forget to enable access to your camera).

‚ù§Ô∏è GOLDEN RULES ‚ù§Ô∏è

-   The dating app is FREE to use for everyone, forever.

-   NO send offensive and rude messages or sexually explicit content.

‚ù§Ô∏è GET MORE WITH HILY PREMIUM  ‚ù§Ô∏è

Lots of Love,

recentChanges:
We know no one likes bugs. We just fixed most of the ones we found. Also, we reduced app size and increased performance!

Some more sweet and pleasant updates:
- New Advanced Compatibility Quiz;
- Better and More Accurate Filters (Now they are super easy to use!);

Thanks for staying with Hily. Remember, you are amazing!
comments: Very comfortable dating app. The swipe system is easy to use, and the application itself is not buggy, it works quickly. Excellent and high-quality filters - shows everything correctly. It‚Äôs also a positive point that Hily is absolutely free. I activated the subscription, and personally, I really like everything. I would recommend this application to all my friends.

You pay for things that are standard with all the other apps and its not as functional so I don't see why anyone would pay for it. It also keeps switching the distance parameters to max every couple minutes so my matches are on the other side of the country, not super helpful. Plus when i change it back, it doesn't seem to impact the results anyways.

Do not use this app! I installed it out of curiosity, and after seeing that there was no one in there, wanted out. However, they do not let you delete your account, let alone remove your data (photo). When talking to support, instead of showing me how to delete the account (spoiler alert: you can't), the agent banned me! Therefore I assume they still have my data and they'll using it to inflate their numbers, maybe for a fake profile? Is there any other way I can effectively report this?

This app encourages third party to sell your data! My account got banned, and this is my first time ever got banned in all of my dating profile on multiple platforms. I have no idea why so I contacted the support. They asked me if I was using the VPN. Of course, I was, and said yes. They reactivate my profile. And got banned again a few mins later. I contacted the support, and they blame me for using the VPN. Hily wants ISP and third parties to get your data. Don't care about customers at all!!

A well-developed dating app is Hily. A friend advised me of this application a week ago, and I decided to test it. Since I have personal experience as an application developer, I can say that the design and interface are lovely and professional. Also features, there are not so many of them, but they act and help a lot. I also like that there are very detailed filters - you can find exactly who you are looking for. Excellent!

title: Hinge - Dating & Relationships
description:
Hinge is the dating app for people who want to get off dating apps. And it‚Äôs working. Currently, 3 out of 4 times Hinge members want to go on a second date, we‚Äôre the #1 mobile-first dating app mentioned in the New York Times wedding section, and we‚Äôre the fastest growing dating app in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia.

üåü BUZZ ABOUT HINGE üåü
‚Ä¢ "Hinge‚Äôs CEO says a good dating app relies on vulnerability, not algorithms." - Washington Post
‚Ä¢ "Hinge is the first dating app to actually measure real-world success" - TechCrunch
‚Ä¢ "A great option for those fed up with temporary love." - TheNextWeb

HOW WE GET YOU OFF HINGE
In today‚Äôs digital world, singles are so busy matching that they‚Äôre not actually connecting, in person, where it counts. Hinge is on a mission to change that. So we built an app that‚Äôs designed to be deleted. 

‚Ä¢ We quickly learn your type. You'll only be introduced to the best people for you.
‚Ä¢ We give you a sense of someone‚Äôs personality. You'll get to know potential dates through their unique answers to prompts, and personal information like religion, height, and politics.
‚Ä¢ We make it easy to start a conversation. Every match begins by someone liking or commenting on a specific part of your profile.
‚Ä¢ We ask how your dates are going. After exchanging phone numbers with a Match, we‚Äôll follow up to hear how your date went so we can make better recommendations in the future.

The app is free to use. Members looking to see who likes them, set advanced preferences, or access Hinge Experts can upgrade to a Preferred Membership. 

Terms of Service: https://hinge.co/terms.html

recentChanges: Bug fixes & performance improvements
comments: Nice concept/different set up and cool prompts but ultimately disappointing. I don't want just to get matches & likes. Like other apps you can't make a connection that lasts than longer than a few minutes before all the sudden they stop responding. I'm a firm believer in "other fishies in the sea", but not when there's a limit of like ten you can try for, who end up not even responding. You guys were right on one thing on your commercial. This app will be deleted, just not useful.

Literally just a better experience than any other app, especially for a person of color. Only critique is that the premium experience doesn't seem to offer that much on the surface, which is fine with me. The free version is perfect. They should have a donate button and maybe a "found love" option when people find a relationship and wanna delete the app

Of course it's a bit difficult to find people on here that you click with, but that's just the reality of dating these days. In terms of dating apps, I think this might be the best one. The way the profiles are set up puts more emphasis on the actual profile, instead of just the pictures. That way you're not just swiping at eye candy. Maybe I'm just biased because I get more matches here than on tinder, but I like this app a lot.

This one is hard to rate due to the pros and cons. Pros: very easy-to-use interface, appears to be genuine users and not fake profiles, known for people looking for long-term dating, reliable with notifications assuming your settings are set correctly on your phone, various prompts that are fun to answer, and requires 6 pictures to even start liking other users' profiles. Cons: profiles feel limited with only allowing you to write 3 short sections to answer prompts, unable to write long introduction messages to users after liking something about their profile, only available as a phone app and not a website to use on your computer, only shows city/town you live in not the state (which is hard since I live near a state border), when un-matching a user you are required to answer why you don't like the user but most answers are regarding sexual harassment or abuse (which is a scary thought) and not related to attributes related to the user. A few other things I cannot think of at the moment. Again, good app, but I haven't found anyone yet. Just wish there was more prompts you could answer than just 3 written answers so you can get to know the person a little better by their profile.

Every time I start the app, it shows me the same profiles in the same order. I can go through 200 unique profiles, and the next time I open the app, I will have the exact same experience. Say I'm short on time and only swipe on 10 profiles. Next time I come back, I'll see those exact same 10 profiles, even though I have them all blocked.

title: BLK - Look. Match. Chat.
description:
BLK is the new app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.
 
BLK is easy and fun to use: 
‚Ä¢	Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 
‚Ä¢	If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‚ÄòYeah‚Äô, or click the 'Heart' icon. 
‚Ä¢	If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away. 
‚Ä¢	Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‚ÄòNah‚Äô, or click the ‚ÄòX‚Äô icon. 
 
Right when you join, all members can: 
‚Ä¢	Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
‚Ä¢	Like other members near you
‚Ä¢	Customize who and what they‚Äôre looking for
‚Ä¢	Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
‚Ä¢	Chat with other members if they‚Äôve liked you back
 
Go Premium and you can also: 
‚Ä¢	Rewind on people to give them a second chance
‚Ä¢	Send over 100 Really Likes per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested 
‚Ä¢	Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 
‚Ä¢	Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

comments: It's so many spam accounts on the app. I almost believe BLK is making up profiles to keep people subscribed. I have had the absolute weirdest interactions or none I would say. I've connected or matched with so many people, yet no communication or very odd communication, then the profile suddenly disappears. Very strange, will not re-subscribing after my subscription for this month expires.

Worst account management ever! I got a new phone number and now can't get back in to my account. No options to retrieve or reset user's account login information. Extremely poor design. Use brain when designing apps. Password reset option are BASIC FEATURES on every app except this one.

The app is cool but use a few tweaks. For one when looking through profiles that have liked you, I'm unable to see ALL pics from that profile. Just the main pic which sucks bc sometimes the main pic is a meme, blurry, or cuts off face. If I'm paying I should be able to see all pics on profile under that category not just the random profile swipe part. Also distance/location should be added and stick to age ranges I have chosen. I have 32-42 but get lots of 20 year olds.

Good app for the most part, has potential. Could be much better if it had a distance filter. I made one match so far and 7 others like me, but like my match they are TOO far away. Also maybe a 1 week free trial could promote the quality of the memberships.

I really like the concept of this app. I honestly think it should be more booming than Tinder. My only complaint is that theres no distance meter - its tragic when I find someone I think I can vibe with, come to find out they're 200 miles away. Add one of those in and it's 5 stars.

recentChanges: Thanks for updating your Zoosk Android app! If you like Zoosk, please leave a nice review in the store. We update our app every two weeks in order to improve the speed and functionality of your dating experience. When new features are available in your area, we‚Äôll notify you in the app.
comments: Like others have said, a message may only be a smile or like which means no one ever actually sends you a message. You're expected to respond to the smile. Also, there aren't many people on here and you can't do anything with the app without paying. Mens profiles are pretty empty and not worth looking at. Very little actual communication happens. The carousel also sucks because you can't move on to another person without hitting yes no or maybe. If you hit yes or maybe it tells them you like the

Nice app, but maybe there should be more options for notifications. I get way too many notifications for a viewing, if I turn it off I don't know if I receive messages so I keep it on. I'd rather have the option if I wish to receive notification of a person who viewed me or send a message. Receiving messages alerts for every little movement is annoying.

Well where can I start, I bought a 1 month subscription to try the full featured app out and this is what I found. It's not aimed at the customer experience and a very badly designed app on that front. If you send a boost it will send to random people with a heart as though you like them. They will not correspond to your filter on a saved search. They will be at distances way out of your local area If you browse who's looked at you it will class it as a view without going into profiles.

Terrible app. Can't see last time people have been online nor if they are paying members. Just a green circle if they are currently online or been online "recently". Can only scroll thru one person at a time. Not see multiple profiles at a time like pof. Lots of people profiles just say "A Zoosk member". Which doesn't mean they are paying member. Just means they didn't set their name. What's worse is hardly anyone responds to messages.

Messages I sent have completely disappeared, 3rd month using it and I find a custom search (ie 20 miles or less) shows a different set of profiles everytime. Feel like alot of the profiles are not real and they want you to pay $$$ for every little feature, even after your subscribe. Send a message, they can't respond without a subscription or you pay for an upgrade. Can't tell if your msg is read without paying. Feel like I've been "Zoosked" out of my $!

title: Rondevo - Global Online Dating
descriptionHTML:

recentChanges: Updates to the intros page, color changes, and various performance improvements.
comments: It's very easy to navigate, it gives you plenty of matches based on your preferences. Something they can improve is once you have written to someone and they don't like you, you can't see your messages to those people. Maybe you can still save those. Messages just so you know who you have reached out to. Also, sometimes you can swipe no by mistake and you can't really go back and unswipe. Other that that pretty satisfied with how the app works.

I have to say, I've tried Tinder, Bumble and Badoo (for Tinder I even paid for the gold subscription) and this was by far the best! Real profiles of amazing people, some of which with great detail, thanks partly to the supplied multiple choice question system. Better matches, fast and efficient filtering. Minimum wasted time. It's a great tool and I'm happy I paid for it! :) Although now with corona, it's kind of wasted money, but that's not the application's fault! üòÇ Thanks for the good times!

I love the fact, especially as a guy, that you can send an intro message with your likes to help you stand out and start a conversation. I think OKCupid has really come a long way in becoming one of the most user-friendly dating sites out there. The only thing keeping me from giving it five stars, is that bumble and tender probably have more attractive women using them, but I think Cupid is also making progress on that front as well!

I had the app before they had the "Doubletake" function and I feel that it was best the previous way since you were able to message directly. With the Doubletake, I feel like the app is useless like Tinder. I have so many people who swiped on me (and vice versa) but somehow they don't come out in Doubletake. If swiping just to pass time is ok with you then you'll have no issue with it. That's all it's good for.

The app itself is great, I have enjoyed using it for years now. The customer service on the other hand is absolute trash. My account was stolen and they refused to respond to any of my many messages. If you have an issue you will be ignored, the best they were able to do for me was banning my account. And this was after months. As a paying customer I found this treatment excessively unfair. There are plenty of competing services with far better customer service.

title: Match Dating: Chat, Date & Meet Someone New
description:
Over 25,000 new members join Match every day. Why? We make connecting with local singles, dating and finding love easy and enjoyable. And we have the track record to prove it:

-	Match is the #1 destination for singles looking for a long-term relationship
-	People who use Match are 3X more likely to find a relationship than those who don‚Äôt
-	2 out of 3 Match first dates lead to second dates

Whether you‚Äôve come to our dating app to meet new people, flirt with local singles or find your long-term partner in crime, we create the space to chat and start meaningful relationships. And with our app‚Äôs updated design, user-friendly navigation and richer profiles, it‚Äôs never been easier. 

See for yourself with: 

*Topics: Skip the personal ad and show off the real you with fun and unique prompts designed to put your personality on display. Did we mention they‚Äôre great conversation starters? 

*Daily Matches: Choose from a new batch of singles selected for you according to your preferences each day.  

*Custom search: Take a break from swiping and search for potential dates based on specific criteria ‚Äì from height to religion ‚Äì whenever you want.    

*Messaging: We‚Äôve enhanced the feel of Inbox, giving you room to have real conversations, beyond the simple ‚Äúhey‚Äù and ‚Äúnice to meet you.‚Äù 

*Details: Share more of your story by including details like hometown, education and profession right in your profile.  

*Smart filter settings: Cut your inbox clutter by customizing your settings to only show you messages from singles that meet your standards. 

 
WANT TO TAKE IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL? 
Get the most out of Match when you become a subscriber. In addition to finding local singles in your area, you‚Äôll be able to:

-	Read & reply to unlimited messages 
-	Find out who likes you
-	See who views your profile
-	Comment on photos
-	Remove unwanted members from your search results 
-	Cancel your subscription at any time 

WE‚ÄôRE JUST GETTING STARTED
Craving more from a dating app? Up your game when you take advantage of the following features:

recentChanges: Spring is right around the corner! Put your connections in full bloom when you download the latest version of Match today.
comments: Positive first, and the only reason this app gets a star; if you pay for a dating app, you take it seriously, so that helps. Now the negatives, its overpriced, bad layout, bad customer service, redundant notifications. I'm glad I only paid for a month to see if it sucked or not before I invested in months. Its really too bad, they could easily fix this, they just clearly dont care.

Profiles keep disappearing when you click X. I cant date everyone at once. I have to click X to see who is next. Now I dont have good prospects under search. Really bad set up. I should be able to see everyone when ever I choose. The people I spoke to in the fall are no longer on my email list since they fall off after a certain amount of time and you have no way of reaching out to them since they do not show up in your search anymore. I paid for the service I should have access to all members.

After a year of having premium and using the monthly boosts that come with it, I still have not gotten a single profile view which obviously means they are not showing me to other people. Sent 18 people (who's search criteria matches my hight, build, race etc.) a message and got 0 replys. With premium you are supposed to get read receipts, you do not. The 1 pro to this site is that you can see other people's search criteria so you don't waste your time messaging people who are not interested.

The app does a great job of letting you specify what you are looking for in a s/o, but even when you pay(which is one of the more expensive ones) the person you message can not message you back if they have a free account. But you can buy the ability for them to respond, and you can buy your profile to the top of the list to be seen more. I will not be renewing when my subscription ends. There are much better dating apps that offer more for the same or less money.

Paying for a premium account isn't enough for them, there is always something else to pay for. You should be able to sort by paid accounts. So you aren't sending emails you will never get a response from. Ohh but you can pay to guarantee a response. Seriously, if you look under the definition of greed in the dictionary Match will definitely be in it.

recentChanges:
- Enhanced profile Boosts

comments: Between the profile attributes, the 20 questions, and the group interests, it has the potential to be a good Tinder alternative. HOWEVER it is foremost way too expensive. $15 a week, $4.60/wk for 3 months ($50), or $2.30/wk for a year ($105). $15 a month? Eh, maybe but not worth it. $15 a week? Not a chance. Like Tinder (and others) the majority of your matches even if you are attractive will be scams. If you are not (like me) it will be all scams. Easy to spot, but annoying and demoralizing.

Better than tinder assuming you are not willing to pay 33 something dollars for tinder premium or whatever it is. This is great if you don't want to spend money. Like why make money off people looking for a relationship, its cruel, but this app isn't super restricting. You're able to talk to people who like you(that's important for me), you can filter your preferences, you can see who swiped right or is interested in you, etc. If you pay for clover premium it's half the price of premium tinder.

The app is a nice change from Tinder and Bumble, but I went for the free premium trial and was mortified to discover the app sending tons of messages on my behalf to people I am absolutely not interested in. There is no way to turn this feature off that I can find. This is embarrassing to say the least, and problematic at worst. I work at a college and could face repercussions if I'm seen to be making a pass at a student. Please do better.

So far, I have found Clover to be a very good App for putting people in touch with each other who may never have had the chance or known the other existed, bc its based on what 2 people nearby each other at the same time may find out when they decide to get together and meet. I just started so we shall see!

Only got this app because literally every add says FREE and it is not free. You can not market something as free and force someone to give you an account with money on it for the services that were previously advertised as free. I want to explicitly say this would have been a 5 star app if I could even start a conversation without giving my card information.

title: Dating App - SweetMeet
description:
Sweet Meet
Welcome to Sweet Meet, an online dating app, where you will meet new people and enjoy dating the ones you like. Whether you need to find a boyfriend, girlfriend, or a soulmate to chat with about everything in the world, you‚Äôll surely be satisfied with our offers. Don‚Äôt miss out on your chance to expand your social circle.

Let‚Äôs get started!
Online dating is cool and easy, you simply sit back and relax with your phone in your hand and enjoy chatting. We know exactly what this is all about. Our free dating website has been successfully helping people start relationships for over 10 years, and now we‚Äôve created this app to make it more accessible to you. You‚Äôll find thousands of men and women who can become your good friends or lovers. It‚Äôs so easy to reach them via Sweet Meet!
No registration is necessary! It‚Äôs absolutely free here. Simply write your name, age and gender, and you‚Äôre ready to go. It‚Äôs so fast and easy, you won‚Äôt even notice that you‚Äôve already found a new friend. Or‚Ä¶ someone more important.
This app is absolutely free. You‚Äôll be able to send gifts, meet new people and then enjoy a successful first date with them. Isn‚Äôt that exciting? After some time of online chatting you‚Äôll meet ‚Äúthe one‚Äù in real life!

 Personalize It!
Sweet Meet allows you to totally personalize your dating experience! Scroll through photos, and swipe the ones you like to the right, and all the rest ‚Äì to the left. Fast and easy!
Choose what exactly you need from this dating app: to create a family or enjoy speed dating with no obligations. Anything is possible!

How It Works
Wanna know how to start? It‚Äôs as easy as pie. You create your account, insert your name, age and gender and‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs all. We don‚Äôt need your phone number or e-mail address, because we respect your privacy. It‚Äôll take you less than a minute to register in the system.
What next? Have a look at offered profiles and make your choice. Send a message to the person you like and get a reply. Chat and get to know each other.


So Close To You!
This free dating app with help you find locals living close to you. No matter what town you live in, we‚Äôll help you find people from the same location. It‚Äôs that easy to meet a man or a woman who lives in the same town as you do!
But if you want to start a relationship with someone from another town, that‚Äôs no problem for us. Any town, any country ‚Äì we embrace people from all over the world!

SPECIAL FEATURES:
- Swipe photos to different sides, whether you like the person or not. 	
- Exchange messages and chat about everything!
- Like photos and get coins. 	
- Spend coins to open new profiles. 	
- Send gifts and express your emotions. 	
- See hundreds of different people every day! 	
- Thousands of beautiful people in one place. 	
- Fast and free registration. 
	
WHO YOU‚ÄôLL FIND:
- Potential boyfriend or girlfriend;
- Soulmate;
- Friends to travel with;
- Foreigners to practice your foreign language skills;
- Interesting people, who will tell you something new and unexpected! 	
Stop being lonely, find people to have fun with! Sweet Meet is here for you. It‚Äôs here to help you communicate.

comments: What's up with the location detection? Phoenix is not 90 miles from me, more like 1,167 lol. My GPS is obviously activated, or the app wouldn't even show people and two different distances. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app. How could everyone else be experiencing the same issue and the fault be on our end? Do you even use your own app? Don't expect us to be your Q&A and expect us all to not be tech savvy ü§£ü§£ü§£

So, there's some bugs with location distances between places on an order of magnitude of hundreds of miles. Market penetration for my area was suprisingly low for 10m users being less than 50 for an area of 50 miles around a major city. I had some issues with messages alerts not occuring. Largest complaint of though is if someone else has an age/gender filter set to not show you, you shouldn't show them to us. All in all, not the best of experiences so far, but hopefully it'll improve.

Not free at all. Same as with most dating apps, they hardly let you do anything or communicate with anyone if you don't pay the $12.49 monthly fee. As my policy goes with these dating sites, I won't pay a penny on till I get to try it in full, so I can decide whether it is worth or not. I'm not going to pay for something I just want to try, to then just find out it is not worth it or it is not qhat they say it is.

Would like to support the app as there's more transparency compared to blackbox apps such as tinder, but really there's a problem with: 1) fake profiles 2) matches with people kms away 3) usability issues (e.g. impossible to write messages comfortably using the tiny text box) 4) Profiles that were discarded as not interested till showing up 5) please also get a desktop app!

Nice idea, etc, but the fact is , the connection to the server is shockingly bad. Maybe too many participants? Who knows. You want a flirting app? Make connections instant, because that makes the difference. Having to wait for hours? Moments lost.

comments: It's ok, missing some features. App tells me I get likes, but there's no section to see your likes, even when paying, I have to assume the first person it shows me likes me. There isn't a section to see your likes either. So far, the app seems very basic, at least it's not expensive, but I'd like to see more features like I mentioned before.

A lot of features are missing/do not work, and I am unable to upload pictures from my device. I have granted all permissions for the app, I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app along with deleting and making a new account. This still has not fixed the issue. This used to be a great app before all of these upgrades

This app needs work. I wonder why I got more likes when it was free than when I paid for the 3 month membership ü§î plus i would say I get 90% of girls who are 100s miles away from me, im sure that is one of the reasons why no one matches me. You say your developers are working on solving location concerns...come on this app was created in 2017, what is taking so long to make this app better. Instead of viewing more pictures I need to check how far away people are, and end up swiping left.
I like the idea but I have to pay right away to even see who I'm matching up with? Like I can't even text them or nothing unless I go premium or wtv. That's ridiculous.

You cant tell where anyone is from. No way to look set locations. This app has a alot of scam accounts and fake profiles. I made the mistake of purchasing a month subscription. Do not make that same mistake. I would like a refund but i doubt they would even do that. Dont even bother downloading this app.

title: Dating for serious relationships
description:
We created our App for people who are looking for the perfect partner for a serious relationship and settling down.

Lots of the popular dating sites out there use standard profiles and completely ignore your personal preferences when selecting candidates. Our Dating app was designed specifically to select an ideal partner who is just right for you. Thanks to our complex, personalized profiles, we precisely select the exact person you've been dreaming about your whole life so you can finally settle down. If you're tired of fruitless searching, dealing with candidates who aren't a match for you, and wasting your time chating on dating sites, just download our unique App designed especially for people who are looking for a serious relationship and true love.

You've probably tried it all before - trying to meet someone on your own or through dating sites - but all this dating just hasn't led to a serious relationship, and the partners you've been even remotely interested in all turned out to be completely wrong for you. Don't give up! If your search hasn't had the results you want, that just means you aren't using the right tools. Compatibility between future spouses is a vital component of a happy, stable marriage. Our app selects the most appropriate candidate for you based on your individual preferences, including personality and appearance, general outlook and interests, and world view.

Our App isn't just another dating site for serious relationships - it's your guiding star.  If you've spent a long time fruitlessly searching for true love and a serious relationship, you're on the right track. Just download our Dating app right now and allow yourself to finally find your soulmate! 

Our dating service is focused exclusively on meeting people and chatting in order to find a serious relationship. That's why all our candidates are carefully screened during the registration process and provide as much information about themselves as possible. This ensures that the profiles you find will definitely match real people. Thanks to this approach, your chance of meeting a man who's a perfect future husband for you is much higher than on other dating sites. Want to find a man to settle down and build a life with? Download our Dating app. Take the first and most important step toward your destiny!

Our app is designed to help you easily find the woman of your dreams! Stop wasting your precious time on sketchy dating sites trying to meet a woman who's completely wrong for you in terms of social status, interests, looks, and personality. Just focus on women who deserve you! Finding a wife is a snap if you use our Dating app. Sign up right now, fill out a profile, and meet and chat with as many people as you want. The perfect candidate is already waiting for you.


Serious dating. Our App offers:
- only real profiles with a complex, individualized approach to choosing the perfect partner
- as much information as possible about every candidate to help you build a solid relationship
- exact portraits generated for every potential candidate
- chat only with people who are a good match for you
- the most accurate selection of candidates for building a strong, solid relationship
- an app designed for serious relationships and marriage

Meeting a girl or guyhas never been this easy.
Our unique online dating site is the best, easiest way to do it. Just contact the person we select and say, "Hi! Want to chat?", and love, dating, and a real relationship will be right around the corner.

Support
Keep in mind that if you have any questions at all, we're always ready to chat and help you solve any problem 24/7.

Forget about all that fruitless searching - download our Dating app right now! Meet new people, chat, get to know each other, and only  go out with the person who's just right for you. Entrust your happiness to the professionals, and we'll help you find your soulmate!

recentChanges: At a glance: you are now able to see how many unread messages you have from each of your matches in your contact list. We've also included some bug fixes and quality improvements.
comments: I actually liked the app before. This new update is the worst. Pay all this money, can't filter at all for what I prefer, and my preferences from before , all gone, and why now no pic profiles. What's the point of creating a specific profile. So what. There is a little heart for compatibility, that's the best thing you guys came up with, during all the malfunctions. Why, Now it's just a mass dating pool. No daily matches. Nothing personal now!! ??

Would rate 0 stars but that wasn't an option. Terrible site, can't really do much without a subscription and subscriptions insanely overpriced. If you do get a subscription the "matches" that sent messages conveniently lost all interest after you pay. Also, the auto renew feature will magically turn back on when you realize the site is garbage then customer service will refuse to acknowledge it and charge you anyway. Recommend you look elsewhere.

Worst dating app I've experienced. The app experience is clunky at best, the filtering options are basic and after the painfully long registration process which claims to match you with the perfect partner...3 months in and I have yet to find one person that I've come even close to having any form of conversation with. I'll begrudgingly keep this on my phone until the end of my subscription but I certainly won't be bothering with this utter waste of money again.

Has potential, but the user's base is horrible. Design and feature-wise the app is okay. The problem I'm experiencing is that the match quality is very bad. Most users have only one photo, with no effort given to profiles, I'd say about a third of profiles shown to me have no photos at all. Of the select few profiles that were appealing, none of them responded; which I assume means they are free users. Waste of money.

The new overhaul on eHarmony is aesthetically nice and smooth. New features give it a bit of sparkle, the icebreakers, allinall messaging (cleaned up the dropped messages from not sending), and the revamped compatibility quiz hones in on the perfect match. The only thing is, unfortunately not every profile has a profile pic when browsing matches. It should be a mandatory requisite!

comments: Firstly, sending messages between matches is free. That is pretty cool. I've noticed some reviews mentioned that users need to pay to send the message. That is not true. Secondly, You can control whether to open your private photos to your matches in the new version. It's really a great function to protect users' privacy. Last, the photo verification feature kicks most of the fakes. I know it's not the developer's fault. Every dating app faces the same problem. 3Fun is better than most of them.

This app is overal a great app. I just recently downloaded 3Fun and my wife and I created a couple profile to looking for attractive singles. We did not expect much at the first time cuz we have tried so many but it just doesn't work out. When I tried to sign up, I noticed that this app allows phone number and Facebook sign up, which is good to reduce scammers. And the whole UI is bright and makes us feel safe. And my favorite feature is that this app verifies its users.

I really love the concept of this app. I have used many general dating apps but they are just not for us. I've got several matches after creating my account, and I really enjoy chatting with them, they are pretty nice and polite. And I saw many reviews complained that 3Fun asks them to pay to chat. I have to stand out and support the team, all of those people did not even use the app, I doubt, cuz it is quite clearly that it is totally free to chat with our matches.

I would like to say 3Fun is not perfect but it is still the best dating app I have ever used. Here are some pros and cons. Pros: 1. It is the largest couple dating app so far. 2. Most of the features are free to use. 3. Less scammers than other apps. 4. Good customer service. Cons: 1. The app has some small glitches in every version. 2. Login/Sign up problem in the UK, pay attention to the "0" before your phone number when login. All in all, 3Fun is a good dating app and worth giving it short.

I enjoy this app very much in a word because it allows to create single and couple profiles. I have several matches but I met two guys who are bad and impolite, but that's not 3Fun's fault, it is just people who use it. Hope there are more users in my area and guys, you have to behave, otherwise, nobody wants to date you!

comments: I subscribed for the free VIP trail of 7 days and added card details to start the free trial(they ask Details). And then I found it not that useful so I canceled it on the very next day. guys common why can't you build a proper app, it's 2020 folks! It just crashes half of the time. I am on one of the latest android phones with enough memory to run this. comments: Best app ever, very easy to access and makes dating life easier, I would recommend everyone to use this app, as it does not ask many things to access it, it gives you clear information and make photos of users instantly available as you open the app, it's easy to communicate to members on this app and there is so many different members to choose from, and it's just a step away to communicate to a member of your choice, and what makes it more nice is the fact that it doesn't ask you a joining fee

The app is chock full of fake profiles and scammer accounts. There is no photo verification process, so no way of being sure who your talking to. Few, if any, of the people seem to be actually interested in meeting in person. Kinda a huge waste of time and major frustration.

Not really impressed a lot of glitches, a lot of fake profile accounts out of 10 people that have contacted me 8 of them were fake. There needs to be a way of actually verifying with a selfie or something that you are the person as well as the location picture should be more specific.

So far this has been a admirable dating app, easy to use and very sensible in the delivery of all aspects you would need in this field of exciting online dating. The blocking views and many bots they do not even try to seem to keep under control got the 4 star rating . Hopefully the administration will see this and get on the task or hire some employees like me to moderate and become the 5 star site they deserve!!

So far so good I was able to upload pictures and fill out my profile now, really have no use or need for the like feature within your app. Have received several solicitations which I can't say I much care for. Have only received 1 vulgar image which I reported of course. And have only noticed one duplicate profile same name two different ages which I found suspicious but overall even though I haven't had any Communications with anyone locally. The app over all seems okay

Are you tired of swiping hundreds of profiles and not finding whom you're looking for? Are you fed up with your crushes not replying to your messages?

So were we. Meeting people online can be frustrating. That‚Äôs why we created Iris ‚Äì a dating app with a unique feature.

Iris employs machine learning to learn what you're physically attracted to. Our AI analyzes thousands of facial features and memorizes your preferences - to then show you only the singles you're likely to find attractive. No more swiping random profiles: you'll definitely like what you'll see!

And the best part is that it works both ways, which means iris can predict mutual attraction. The attractive singles you see are also attracted to you! Better matching means better connections and a better experience for everyone.

As you continue to use the app, Iris will continue to learn your preferences - which means your experience will only get better! Iris is trained by you, for you.

NEED TO KNOW
- Verified authentic profiles
- Profile selection individually tailored for YOU
- Security: you only receive messages and engage with whom you choose

BASICS
- iris is free to download and use
- View our Terms of Use https://www.irisdating.com/terms-of-use
- View our Privacy Policy https://www.irisdating.com/privacy-policy
- You must be at least 18 years old to use

comments: As others said, I'm not SUPER thrilled that it's entirely appearance-driven right now, but it's clearly still in development and I'd be interesed to see what becomes of it in the future - "you're interested in these, so we think you could have a lot in common with these people." It's also going to live or die by its user base. Right now there are "only" 10k-ish installs, and I don't even know if the people it's showing me are in the same geographic region as me. High hopes, long way to go.

Ok, I was not clear enough in my first comment.. the app will not accept my phone number, I would not use my Facebook but ended up doing so anyway.. now that I'm on I cannot verify my photo. the app wants to use my Facebook photo which wont work because I don't use a photo of me on Facebook.. Then there's the fact that I get plenty of people to view but who knows where they are from, I'm not wasting time finding out locations, it should be known without asking them all. Incomplete junk app

The app is good for what it does, but I think it takes it a step too far and insinuates looks ARE everything. There are no bios, no shared interests, nothing to make people stand out beyond their profile pics (other than that what do you like and what do you dislike thing.) Over all I can't continue using the app because I'm looking for more than a guy I'm attractive to. It's a nice idea but sadly unfinished.

I really don't like dating apps, but this one has a lot of potential! I felt kind of vain prioritizing looks, but it seems to be working for the better. You even get to upload pictures of people who you consider to be the epitome of attractive. Anyways, what I don't like is that apparently everyone who uses this app is in New York (which is literally on the opposite end of the country from me!). I only want to see people within 50 miles, not 1000+!

Very poor app, expects you to pick date from seeing pix one time, no info about person not even distance. You can't go back to review people. How many of us think this way? AI is very stupid. Not many people on this app anyway. Not worth space on phone, days of no people appearing, just says more profiles tomorrow, but tomorrow never comes. Deleting app, I don't recommend this app at all. App doesn't explain, after you leave neg feedback, then they tell you should done Complete waste of time!!!

title: Black White Interracial Dating - Interracial Match
description:
Interracial Dating: The New Enlightenment

Less than a century ago, interracial dating was something you didn‚Äôt talk about, and something to hide if you did prefer a person of a different color.  There were few places you could go to safely without causing some sort of scandal, and even fewer people who were willing to listen with understanding.  

Maybe it was the rhythm and blues saturating the basements of late night entertainment.  Maybe it was a society lifting out of the Great Depression, with more tolerance accompanying their more affluent life styles.  Maybe it was the boldness of writers, spokes people and celebrities campaigning for civil rights, but by the 1960‚Äôs, interracial dating slowly became more acceptable.  

The changing times brought its own set of problems.  Even as the work force became more integrated, with minorities and women stepping into roles once designed for white, professional males, and public places ceased separating or refusing services to minorities, interracial dating was still awkward.  It was an era of general agreement on civil rights, but there weren‚Äôt very many among the Depression Years parents who were prepared to bring racial integration into the home. 
 
The Millennial Perspective

The awkward early years of racial integration jump-started interracial dating.  Today, seven percent of the population claims a mixed race heritage.  The number is growing rapidly, with most interviewee‚Äôs stating pride in their multiracial origins and claiming their heritage has made them more open to other cultures. 
 
Seven percent is significantly higher than in the 1970‚Äôs, when only one percent declared a mixed race background, but analysts feel these number are actually only about half the actual percentage, as many who are mixed race claim only one ethnic background.  The majority of those who claim only one race are middle-aged or older.  
From Age to Regional Location

The younger you are, the easier it is to find a partner for interracial dating.  The twenty to thirty year old set are generally very casual and already have a wide mixture of multi-cultural and multi-racial friends.  Tolerance, however, especially by family and community, can vary greatly according to demographics.  In many areas, especially regions that historically disapproved of mixed race dating, there may no longer be taboos, but the cultural clash still exists.  The family, and even your date, might have stereotypical views of your personal tastes and behaviors.  

Crossing the barriers where racial misconceptions still exist takes fortitude and patience.  Interracial views are changing rapidly but not racial views.  You may experience those uncomfortable moments of somebody going out of their way not to offend you, anxieties concerning appropriate behaviors, or even suspicion and reserved behaviors.  

Unless you are dating someone with exactly the same historical background, social status and religion, you are still going to be challenged by your date‚Äôs customs.  For many races, the customs are more engrained than color, status or ancestral origins.  Religion may be an important influence on their lives, even if they no longer declare a religious preference, as they will make time for the traditional values of their family. 
 
But that‚Äôs part of what interracial dating is all about.  It‚Äôs an opportunity to take a broader look at the world around us, to improve our communications with others, and learn about differing cultures and customs that can enrich our everyday lives.

Black white color app is open to all singles, gay, lesbian or bisexual, all ages, teens, over 40s,over 50s mature or seniors, all races, black, white, mixed, Asian, Indian, Hispanic, Mexican, Latina... If you are a sugar baby seeking black sugar daddies for arrangement, young guy looking sugar momma, cougars for casual encounters or hookup, here our app has over 500,000 singles to find your matches. Join for free today to meet local singles.

recentChanges: It‚Äôs now easier than ever to meet people who inspire you on CMB! We‚Äôve embraced a clutter-free design that highlights what matters most: you and your connections. comments: Unfortunately the app isn't as good as it used to be. At one point, we had videos of people that answered questions. Now that was different and very awesome. It eliminated the fakes and someone who was serious. However, now, it's hard. Seeing Covid-19 is real, i recommend bringing it back as states are shutting down.

App has become very slow over the last few months. Sometimes buttons or pages take a few seconds to register and load. If you have the app opened in the background and send a response at a later time the app rejects it and hangs. You have to close the app, open it again, and send the message again. How is this app even allowed to ship without proper scaling built in? It looks like the team needs to focus on their spaghetti code clean up rather than new features for a while.

It wasn't like the app I heard it was or imagined it to be! The reason I installed the app was just that other dating apps like tinder are overcrowded. I heard this app delivers quality matches but using it for past three days I won't agree with the statement. This app has very limited features to use for free and seeing the way the app operates in the area I am using it, won't make any difference to get the high pricy paid version. I hope it gets better with time but won't recommend downloading

Probably the best design of any dating app I've tried. However, the developers botched the monetization so badly it ruins the experience. They also suggest users who haven't logged in in two weeks, which is far longer than other dating apps. Get ready to swipe on a whole lot of stale bagels that haven't actually opened this app in ages.

Been having some issues with the app recently. Issues like matches through "Suggestions" or "Discover" are not appearing in the Chat tab. Support through the app is also weird and doesn't give much confidence as they have a "attach image/screenshot" which doesn't work. I found this out while trying to attach screenshots regarding the Matches not appearing in Chat issue. Please fix the App . Thanks! Update #1, 17Mar2020 : both support and customer experience have ignored me for 24hours or more.

title: OurTime Dating for Singles 50+
description:
Our Time, Dating Made Easy

Our Time is the #1 dating app for mature men and women, with a simple mission: To help singles in their 50s, 60s, and beyond spark meaningful connections. Our unique focus is on celebrating this time of your life, and helping you find the quality connection you‚Äôre looking for. Whether it‚Äôs marriage, romance, friendship or companionship‚Äîwe want to help you find that someone special to celebrate this time of your life with. In addition to being the best dating app for people over 50, we‚Äôre also safe and easy to use. We review every profile and every photo to help ensure the best quality of matches for you, and we‚Äôve completely redesigned our App with the focus on simplicity. So join now, and find that connection you‚Äôve been looking for! Go from wondering who‚Äôs out there to discovering someone wonderful.

We‚Äôre here to help you every step of the way. There‚Äôs no better time than now to go from wondering who‚Äôs out there to discovering someone wonderful. This is your time, so wait no more!

This server is the most laggy and defective dating site ive ever used.To send a message in rush hour is pathetically slow and since there is no notification of 'message sent' my messages are sent in double or triplicate.The small type in message sending is so close to the 'send' comand that unfinished commentary is forcibly sent before it is completed.This has resulted in many losses of relationships,frustration,embarrassment and missunderstanding. comments: Overall, the format and style of the app is much better than other dating apps out there, however I wasn‚Äôt getting many matches when I first downloaded it. So I fixed up my profile; chose newer, more flattering pictures of myself, utilized the wide range of prompts available within the app, and extended my match distance. I travelled a bit, tried the app in other areas while I was there, looking for a sliver of hope, but alas, nothing came to fruition.

I want to give this app a positive review, as I've seen many local possible connections. However, as soon as I payed for upgraded access, I was blocked from logging into my account (within 10 minutes). I'm hoping to get access back quickly, but if it is not, I will be forced to dispute the charge for this service, or further action. Here's to hoping this service takes this seriously

Also the recommendations are people you would actually like to meet based on what you‚Äôre looking for, not just ‚Äúhey this person is near you‚Äù. Also, I met my girlfriend on here so.I might be a little biased, but I really think this is the best app there is for meeting a quality person.

I have been on many different dating apps and have had more success on gaper then the rest combined. The way the app is set up encourages topics of conversation and allows you to write a comment when matching, which gives a big advantage. If you are sick of talking to people and having them go nowhere, give gaper a go.

I really enjoy the app. I like how it give you a limited likes per day. This limited your conversations. I don‚Äôt like tinder or bumble because I get easily distracted with the amount of conversation I have. Here I am usually speaking with three to four girls and I am really getting to know them. Being able to like certain parts of a bio is a nice organic conversation starter. My only complaint is that I don't always get notifications for the messages I'v.

Clean, easy to use, and by far the best of the dating apps! I do suggest adding a "got a number" or "number" to the options; when swiping right on a conversation. I am finding a decreased use of the app is the product of getting a number or use of some external communication application.

Having tried most of the other so called, 'free' dating apps I'm mystified as to why POF isn't number one. It gives all the things the other sites give you but completely free. If I had one complaint it would be that the downside of all these free features is that there is sn abundance of fake profi.

I met my current partner on this app and could not be happier! I only spent about a week on this app looking for dating or friendship, and it just so happened that I found someone I truly connected with! This experience seems much more authentic than other apps. Must try, whatever you‚Äôre looking f.

Easily the most comfortable interface I've used out of the many dating apps I've had over the years. Also the most detailed questions (sometimes, a little too detailed tbh) available to answer and share with other people. The explore option is also a great tool to limit your search radius to exactly.

comments: *Update...its Feb 10 and my profile is still not active. Millionaire match replied below saying 2 to 3 days, nahh that was a lie too...Account is still inactive! I honestly believe they are choosing who they give access to! I have emailed support as suggested. This App is trash. My profile has been "pending review" for over 2 months! Absolutely ridiculous. I really believe they choose and pick who they add to their platform!!! Eve0527 is my user name if anyone cares to check into the problem!

Not sure what's going on, over a month later and it's still just sitting there saying to wait and that I don't have access yet....but i can see messages and stuff coming in i just have zero access to reading or responding to them...I feel like enough people in reviews have complained about this exact thing I dont get why it's not fixed yet.

Poor user experience. 'Profile Pending approval' stage takes far too long (still ongoing) and the user support email process/customer service is appalling. Steer clear and don't be fooled into giving passport/driving license information over. Despite following the method requested by the team at the app below, I'm still awaiting a response. My original review still stands - terrible application/customer service and clearly just a personal data gathering scam. Avoid at all costs!

I've been waiting for over a month to get approved and still nothing. All I get is a message saying, "please be patient. You'll be added soon!". Yeah right!

title: The League
description:
So you want to date someone that shares your same education level AND ambition/drive? And maybe, just maybe, you'd like them to be in your same neighborhood, attractive enough to at LEAST look good in a black-and-white photo, with a height that meets your way-too-restrictive height preferences. We want to build a community where smart, driven people can find and meet each other.

comments: If I could give no stars I would. This is a stupid app. You expect people to be on a waiting list to see other matches??? That doesn't make sense. I was number 8600 on the waiting list to be added into a pool of matches. That could take weeks to actually meet someone. Do better with the entire process.

Crazy long waitlist where I waited 2 weeks to not even move up. Also membership seems to be the only way to make this apps useful or worth anything and it's stupidly high price. Costing you over 200 bucks for 1 month. Dont waste your time go to tinder or bumble and buy their membership and you will get more out of it.

The app is TOO exclusive. It has run out of people in my state to show me, so now I'm matching with people 300-400+ miles away. Expanding dealbreaker preferences for the sake of seeing more people kind of ruins the point of having a serious dating app and not just Tinder.

This was an awful experience. "The league" sells itself as an app that enables users to interact with a more elite group of people than other online social networks and dating apps. It does no such thing. There is no vetting except for a wait period and a very harsh "red flag" system where unpopular users are vote out. You will be assigned a "concierge" which is a grainy bot like image managed by different staff members who are not particularly helpful. I met one person via it. Grim experience.

It's not really an exciting app, it has professionals. We can narrow it down further as: Just an app with limited number of prospects shown per day, where chats expire after a certain time and has a chat room for people who would class themselves as"foodies" for example (chatrooms are quiet). Nothing else really. To be frank, you don't really want to join "The League", it's not really that interesting or exclusive. Definitely wouldn't recommend paid for access, you'll be highly disappointed

title: YourChristianDate: Meet Your Christian Soul Mate
description:
YourChristianDate is a premier online community for anyone looking to date and marry within the Christian faith. We provide an opportunity to find a meaningful and long-lasting relationship with Christian singles worldwide based on shared values and beliefs.

YourChristianDate App is the place for singles across the world to find each other and begin a relationship using a range of communication features. We provide the platform and tools for members to get in touch. 
Like any dating opportunity, it all starts by creating a profile with a photo and sharing personal details. The next step is to search through the membership database and quickly see other people who have joined. One of the highlights of our dating app is to read about members both locally and from other parts of the world. Once members are interested in each other, they can talk using a direct message system and Live Chat. All activity takes place on a secure, reliable and safe network that guarantees the privacy and safety of every member. And our Customer Service Team is always on hand to assist with any enquiries.

Here are the main benefits of our service:

‚àô Find your perfect match in a couple of clicks!
‚àô Personalized search ‚Äì get introduced to users based on your preferences. 
‚àô Verified profiles ‚Äì our 24/7 customer support checks and verifies every member.
‚àô Instant Chat & Offline Messages ‚Äì talk in real-time and stay in touch at all times. 
‚àô Get notifications if the member liked you or looked at your profile.

Become a member today and find a meaningful and long-lasting relationship!

Please note:
‚àô YourChristianDate App is safe and secure with full protection
‚àô You must be at least 17 years old to download and use this App
‚àô Customer support: support@yourchristiandate.com

About Us
YourChristianDate is at the forefront of the online dating world and offers an unmatched global reach. Launched in 1993, our company now covers more than 32 countries and offers the technology that lets members take dating further than ever. Our ambition is to connect singles no matter where they are and inspire romance on a global scale. The experience we have built since our launch has given us a real insight into what people look for when it comes to dating. We offer the most direct and successful approach to meeting singles anywhere in the world.
YourChristianDate.com feels at home all over the world. We have headquarters in New York but our global presence means we have offices in Europe, Asia and Latin America. That is because we know the world of romance has changed. Now singles want to search further afield for their special someone. And YourChristianDate is in the perfect position to introduce Catholic matches from a range of places and cultures.
Everything we do is aimed at bringing singles together and helping them start a relationship with a special partner. We have developed this skill into a fine art! Our effective approach helps couples find each other on our website. That is why we continue to be inspired by the love of those who use YourChristianDate.com and Christian mingle feature.

comments: Went to subscribe so I could talk to someone and was shown three sketchy payment options. $6 through Google play, 3 bucks through card or PayPal. When I selected Google play it said that after one month the price would go up to 12.99 I was alright with that until I found out that I'd have to pay for credits to actually talk with someone. Long story short. You have to pay alot of money to talk to fake accounts. Not worth the time or money dont do it.

DO NOT USE THIS APP! This app is pathetic within 5 minutes of using it I was contacted by almost 50 fake profiles. I didn't even have a chance to try to make a purchase in the app before being annoyed with it. Also there is no way to delete your profile once you make it. Which means end time the server will bog down and not even respond well. Also there are many little things like when you're writing your description. It just writes it out in a straight line making it hard to proofread.

I do not like the app at all why credits you ask so much for no reason I am not gonna waste another cent on this app. Not only that if we communicate with God it is free we are willingly to praise him freely but pay for a subscription? God wouldn't allow it never ever ever. If we must pay then we are wasting time and money.

This app is filled with model looking characters from all over world which I like very much. They also have a great decent values to top off the good looks. The app is very problematic and loses connection to the internet constantly here in the USA. I also hate that I have to constantly purchase credits each time to send basic texts or in-app emails. It's ridiculous. Hope the developers can change their usage packages because we dont have to pay for basic texts in other apps

So after waiting 20 minutes to signup I upload pictures of myself that don't actually upload. I left it because I wasn't about to waste half an hour. I came back to try again and 16 profiles had contacted me with very obviously fake display pictures. I clicked to reply by say "Hi bot" and immediately I'm asked to pay. Ayt, I'mma head out.

title: MeFlirt - Online Dating finder. Match date online
description:
MeFlirt is a dating online app that helps meet new people and have a good time. Make friends, like-minded people and maybe even love.

What could be easier than online dating? In the 21st century people are so busy, so it is a great way to meet interesting and attractive people and have a good time in a good company. Online Dating is a way for people to find and contact each other through the Internet to arrange a date with the goal of developing a romantic and personal relationship.

Meeting online and offline doesn‚Äôt have much of a difference at all because online dating is just replacing the traditional way of meeting a person. Our world improved where new technology and inventions started to take over and now many people prefer to communicate using their devices because it brings them more convenience and confidence. But that doesn‚Äôt mean that if a couple first met through an online dating mobile app, they are less committed to one another.
Any relationship can start by catching someone‚Äôs eye and starting a conversation. In some cases, meeting online can be easier and better than usual offline. There are a lot of reasons why dating online is a success. It might be because people tend to open up more and be themselves which are essential in making relationships work.

There are many benefits that come with using online dating platforms, which goes some way toward explaining why they have become so popular among people of all ages and from many different backgrounds.
One of the major benefits of using dating apps is that there is so much choice out there. No matter what sort of experience or person you are looking for, you will find a dating service that can help you to meet them. Another key benefit is that even those with very busy lifestyles can meet others by using these platforms. Often, people that work long hours or have family commitments cannot get out there to socialize on a regular basis, which reduces the chances of meeting new people. Such dating platforms make it possible to meet new people from the comfort of your own home and at a time that suits you.

Online dating gives an opportunity for people who are too shy to start communicating with others and doesn‚Äôt have enough time for dating. This tool would give every person a chance to choose which is the right match for them and find true love. Install MeFlirt dating app today to meet amazing singles near you - friendly, respectful, and fascinating people looking for a partner to take on new adventures.

comments: this app really is free. You don't feel like you are missing out if you don't pay, which is great. The app doesn't hide who liked you behind a paywall, nor does it require a mutual match to begin a conversation, so it is easy to find a good company. Thia app works way better than the aforementioned services, just give it a go and you will see what a real dating app should be like! :)

I think this app has a different way to say you like someone without swiping like all the other dating apps. The way you accomplish this is by looking through their preselected FB pictures with comments that others can enter for each photo. Then you have to select one photo to "like" and then leave a c.

I found it very very easy to use and you pick the ones what's in my area other apps dating apps do my head in because I've joined a few and they give me people far far far too far from me . I joined before as well but lost my password and that's why I didn't come on but yes it's up to now it's a goo.

Better than any other dating app I've used so far. I ended up deleting all the other dating apps I had and kept this one. Doesn't make you pay to see who liked you or matched with you or to add extra information about yourself. Hopefully it stays that way and doesn't change for the worse in the long.

Easy to use. The app is an excellent way to do everything when you're not online. You'll have fakers and liars basically anywhere in a dating app but this gives me control of who I want to be in touch with. all basic functions are free. This app is amazing.

comments: Positive Singles seems to care about dating. Constant updates and they continue to come up with new features. The swipe feature is structured so you can‚Äôt miss reading a little bit about the person your swiping on. Which more often than not makes you actually then click on the profile and read more... and in my experience change your mind. Looks aren‚Äôt everything.

The app is okay. The search function was kind of glitchy even if you upgrade to premium, searching the distance from your zip code wasn't very accurate. Fairly pricey membership, considering there are very few users in my area. I couldn't justify the price to remain a premium member, especially with lack of functionality on premium features.

I would highly recommend it than tinder or okcupid. This HSV dating app works really well and allows you to search with lots of criteria. I have a couple of issues with the app. Recently it has stopped allowing you to see who has liked your profile. I really enjoyed this feature because it was a way for people to break the ice.

This is an actual experience that connects to real people in a ‚Äúcloser‚Äù radiance than most apps like tinder, okcupid or pof. I‚Äôve actually had conversations and not just some fake stuff. comments: The UI for this app needs a LOT of work. The filters for looking at profiles aren't worth anything really. There's no way to look for people within a certain distance. Either you're looking in a specific city or distance isn't an option. You also can't filter by role preferences and I found out that you can't even send a single message unless you pay for premium. The app needs a lot of fixing before it's even usable at a basic level.

So far it is nice, but it needs work. In this app you can not filter people by state, nor can you filter people by THEIR preferences (what kind of relationship they want, fetishes, etc.). Also, this app uses predefined lists of cities for each state that you must choose from when setting location. This would be fine, if the lists were complete. I live in Farwell, Clare MI, USA. Neither Clare or Farwell are available options, and the closest city/county i can choose is Saginaw.

Supposedly there's 8 people that liked my profile. I can see everyone that's even looked at my profile and out of curiosity I liked them all back. Yet somehow I have no new matches? On top of that, I've only been able to send a single message all week unless I want to upgrade to premium. Sketchy af.

As a very powerful BDSM dating app, it brings together a lot of single people who are very clear about what they are looking for. It's good for us, we can find many potential matches and find a perfect one. The result is always good, which is the main reason why I come here to recommend me

Although I just want to find people who like quirks to talk about fetishism in my spare time, this app is also very interesting for many users. In order to allow me to enjoy the day and reduce the pressure after work, I will recommend it in my group.

Ship is on a mission to make dating easier and more fun. That‚Äôs why Ship brings your inner circle into the dating experience so you can share in the meet cutes, the crushes, and the ghostings together. It used to take a village, now it takes a group chat.

comments: Quality matches on this app. I didn't use the ship with friends though.

I love the concept of this app, but there are quite a few bugs to be worked out and improvements to be made. Looks like it's pretty new though, so that's to be expected! Main problem I and my friends are having is the gender customization feature. It often crashes the app :/ Many of my settings (such as show gender on profile, potential matches' age range + location range) keep resetting and won't save. Other than that, keep up the good work, devs! Excited to see what features get rolled out!

Its a pretty cool concept and i think this has what it takes to become a superb dating app. Would've given 5 stars but first, my phone crashes every time I get a notification, I guess due to the lack of optimization for notifications on a second screen. Second, it still lacks quite a bit of people, but I'm sure you guys will get there. Best of luck!

Love the general concept and sharing it with friends. However, I seem to be missing features my Apple friends have. We are all in the same group, but I cant access the "activity" feature. They are chatting about shares in the convo tab and I'm completely left out, because I cant see the other tab. Seems like something that should not be hard to update. Update: Moving this down to one star. It's been months and the Android version is still useless. Why even release it?!

Love the concept behind this app, but the Android version is missing some of the best features :(. I can't see any of the activity, can't share profiles, and can't even send pictures in the chat :(. Also, it would be cool if the chat had the same feature as iMessage where you can like or 'react' to people's messages. Keep working on the Android version, please!!!!

comments: Sucks. App is poor. Waste of money. Sure. I can elaborate. All the features on the web are not available in the app. In the app, when fake profiles are identified (which is quite often), and removed, if they contacted you, the face icons change for everyone in the inbox and continue to do so while you scroll. After the first week or so, the number of blank photos and incomplete profiles starts to increase until gets a picture is rare. And when you do, it is usually a fake.

You can't see photos or view anyone's profile unless you pay a premium membership. I stayed only 30 min on the app to open an account and figure out how it worked. Then I uninstalled it. This app is made more for profit instead for matching since there is no functionality to facilitate easy communication between members. I hope all my data entered was deleted forever from their system since there was a glitch with it and it would not allow me delete my account.

Garbage. You go through the entire account creating process just to learn every match photo is blurred out. Also the tools to upload your photos feel like they're 20 years old. As a result you end up with off center and horribly cropped pics. I'm deleting and uninstalling. This was a waste of time

I would have given 5 star. Why are there no option to pay for 1 month in the premium subscription. The minimum you can pay for is 3 months and is calculated in per month billing, why do I have to be on a dating site for 3 months, what's that for? I am only to find one good man and move on with her. Please make option available for 1 month premium subscription. I will give 5 star if you can fix that.

I made payment for a premium subscription for 6 months, 2 days later everything is blocked on my account and it shows I must pay again for a premium membership.. title: FarmersOnly Dating
description:
We started FarmersOnly.com in 2005 because, the way we see it, there are basically two groups in America. Group one revolves around five dollar latt√©s, riding in ubers, and getting ahead at all costs in the corporate world. If you fall into this group, FarmersOnly is not where you want to be dating online.

Group two enjoys blue skies, living free and at peace in wide open spaces, raising animals, and appreciating nature. We understand the meaning of southern hospitality, even if we don't all live in the South. This group makes up America's Heartland ‚Äì the slice of America with good, old-fashioned traditional values, values that were never lost by America‚Äôs farmers. These values are also preserved by the cowboys and cowgirls who still live on the edge, nature lovers who don‚Äôt take the outdoors for granted even though it‚Äôs free, and horse riders, ag students, and other animal caretakers.

If you‚Äôre in this group and going to be dating, there is no community that comes even close to FarmersOnly.com. For over 13 years, we‚Äôve been bringing millions upon millions of country, outdoorsy, down to earth and family-minded folks together all over America.


OUR PHILOSOPHY
We don‚Äôt post on your Facebook Timeline. We don‚Äôt share your information with unknown parties. We do not generate any artificial activity. The app is free to use! For advanced features and access you can upgrade to a Premium Membership.

title: Olaa - Meet New Friends Nearby
description:
‚ÄúSay Hi‚Äù and Chat¬†
It's just that easy, If you like someone around the corner, just click ‚ÄúSay Hi‚Äù and chat, whenever there is a reply, there will be a match! With over millions of ‚ÄòSay Hi‚Äô, Olaa is a completely safe environment for all. We want to help you connect with new people nearby, whether is for a good time or even a long time! 

Nearby Location Function
Olaa offers you ways to chat with people in your area. The geographical function would show you someone new nearby according to your location. You can easily connect with anyone around your usual cafe, mall or even just the next corner! Did we mention that you can share daily pictures and captions as your 'Moment'? Isn't it a good way to start conversations?

Safe and Secure
We care about your safety, we promise to provide you with a safe and secure environment so that you don‚Äôt have to worry about exposing yourself to the internet. Olaa allows our users to filter the visibility to other users within a certain distance. If you don't like that person, just simply do not reply to their 'Say Hi', there would be no way they can keep harassing you. 

Just an F.Y.I.¬†
Olaa is all about being your true self, a social platform for all. To use the 'Say Hi' function, please upload a clear photo of yourself so that we could get to know you better.

Olaa cares about every one of you. To protect your rights and interests, we ask all users to follow our . Any violations would lead to a possible suspension from the community.

To serve you better, we offer 24/7 customer servers, please feel free to contact us via our Facebook page or email us at support@olaahelp.zendesk.com if there is any question, we will try our best to solve the problem you have encountered.

Download Olaa now and get ready to connect to the world, it is just one HI away.
