comments: The site floods your inbox with the same letters over and over so you will never find a letter from a girl you are actually having conversation with. Very annoying

I enjoy the concept + I enjoy the platform = worth it for me. On their other platform: When a lady was deceptive, customer service looked into it. When a lady sent me what I felt was spam, customer service looked into it. *Warning* This app is not for guys lookin to have a cyber sex hookup for only a few bucks a month. There are other apps for that. "Game" can easily become void when you pay for each message and by the minute.

Concerning the app, it is effective for chatting, viewing profiles, and direct calls. Unfortunately, viewing letters is extremely tedious, as you will have to scroll through; for what seems hours, to check if you recieved something from someone specific. I would suggest a search function for the letters section. Also, maybe a tab dedicated to all your communication forms (letters, pictures, etc.) with your favorite members. Additionally, it is not possible to send pictures via letters.

INCREDIBLY EXPENSIVE! Seems like a ploy to take your money. If it wasnt, you would be able to chat for free after the initial fee. This seems set up more for just making people feel good than actually dating. I havent seen any stories about people meeting in real life. So you'll just keep spending money to talk for 5 mins at a time. RIP OFF. I went through 30 dollars in 15 mins.

Very deceiving. You pay the 12.99 plus tax and can only send 2 letters back. Then you have to buy more credit. Should tell you this when you sign up. I am uninstalling as soon as my month is up. Also very pretty pictures of ladies who write you, but when you reply, you get nothing back. POS app. If i could give it 0 stars i would. Totally sucks. Women are beautiful but no wany can you afford to keep paying the prices for credits. 10 cridits to send letter, 10 credits to see 1 minute cam ect

comments: Good and reliable

I dislike this app highly. Although it does offer a great opportunity to meet new people, it does not let you chat with people freely. I matched with someone I would have loved to have talked with, but I have to pay to speak with them. Something I found utterly absurd. Yet, when I didnt match with someone, I was able to speak with them. I found that I disliked the blocking system as well, when I blocked a man he was still able to see my profile and read it. It would have been lovely otherwise.

Terrible app! Once I logged in and my profile was blocked for no reason. To activate it they require to provide them ID document. Hey if you changed your policy that all users must provide their ID, you should have sent letter and warn about it in advance but not to block profiles suddenly! What about my contacts that I chatted with trusted to your app and now lost forever? What about your members that pay for your services and all of a sudden lost their contacts after long chat? Pfff

So, many, scammers. I really had high hopes... First impression...paid the fee... Unfortunately it seems like there are very few actual daters on the site. Many seem to ask for your email, Google, or Skype directly within the first few messages with some lame excuse. If you refuse, they disappear same for 80% of people I meet. Online dating if fraught with scams I know, but if they are unable to at least minimize this problem the app will be useless.

If i could give this App a 0 i would. Don't download this App its a scam. They could atleast allow users who like each other message each other like Tinder and other Apps. Dont purchase premium! Non premium accounts are also useless because unless you buy a premium your Match wont see. So whats the catch? They limit you with a few useless features to hook you. comments: As with any dating app, there are features that are only unlocked if you pay a monthly subscription however , loveplanet has created an app that eliminates a lot of the BS, and allows you to really connect with people. Through questionnaires that at first seem mundane but over time get really interesting and actually make you question yourself, you create a percentage based personality of yourself and when other people meet or come near the percentage they become matches. Best dating tool yet :) check it out

This is by far the best online dating site out there. I have never felt the need to give any app a review until now. What makes it stand out, is its ingenious method of quizzing you to found out whom you are compatible with, a method much more advanced than any other questionnaire I have encountered previously.

This app is like all the rest of the trash we get to choose from. I was only on for less than 5 mins. But that was long enough to discover that this is trash. So i ,created a profile which i could barely do cause the height and weight measurements were foreign to me. I am used to the metric system, i dont normally give my weight in centimeters lol. Besides that you have to pay to msg. Anyone. No one lives nearby, and the only person that checked me out was from russia.

Works quite well. Adds a lot of layers to profiles to help you see more of who may be compatible. I would like to see more of the desktop versions features available on the mobile app, but still a great app!
If a persons age requirements. are limited to 35 then that person should not appear as a potential match for a 48 year old. This way matches could be truly found. Just a thought...

comments: The app was working well but a recent update has stopped the app working. When I go to use the app it directs me to get an updated version from the app store. comments: This app SUCKS! You can't navigate and get to all of your messages or other areas on the app, and technology has come WAY too far for this seemingly antiquated app. It is especially bad when, like me, you cannot login on the site because their Captcha is bad and won't accept the correct information you enter.

I've paid for a service I do not have assess to and impossible to get any live assistance.

comments: You need to add an extra filter for those who do not have British status/valid visa. There are filters for age and location, you need to add an extra filter so we can choose if we do/do not want to chat to someone with an expired visa. Also, sort out the location issue - always inaccurate and misleading! March 2020: When instant matched, it used to show their name & LOCATION on the home screen. Why did you remove that? Now it shows occupation. Also, please add function to turn off read receipts.

I just updated the app. Just like previous reviews, the app shoves up advertisements to user's faces very frequently and it seems that the developer is not doing anything about it. The waiting duration for instant chat is absurd. Users had to wait almost a month to use the function. Total waste of time. I would recommend developers learn from Tinder to be successful. As a developer myself, LISTEN to USER's feedback. I'll change my review once the developer starts to LISTEN to users.

Frustrating. Been using this app on/off for a while. Most accounts are inactive or fake. The search facility does not work. If you do not select an ethnicity then the whole search feature becomes irrelevant. It should be mandatory to select an ethnicity otherwise having things like sect is pointless and ridiculous if the basic features don't work. Also the app is very slow and it does not bring back a comprehensive search. You are better off wasting your money on Tinder.***response made no sense
